price: Na kutokana na baba zao, na vizazi vyao na ndugu zao. Na tukawateuwa na tukawaongoa kwenye Njia iliyo nyooka.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡ وَإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡۖ وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
footnotes: Na tuliwateuwa baadhi ya mababa wa hao, na dhuriya zao, na ndugu zao, na tukawakhitari wao, na tukawawezesha waifuate Njia isiyo kwenda upogo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamin ābāihim wadhurriyyātihim wa-ikh'wānihim wa-ij'tabaynāhum wahadaynāhum ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
